mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score (student_id, class_id, lesson, score, error, comment) VALUES (#{student_id}, #{class_id}, #{lesson}, #{score}, #{error}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS student_id, sc.id AS score_id, s.name, sc.lesson, sc.score, sc.error, sc.comment, sc.created_at FROM student s LEFT JOIN score sc ON s.id = sc.student_id AND sc.lesson = #{lesson} WHERE s.class_id = #{class_id} and lesson = #{lesson} ORDER BY sc.score DESC, LEFT(SPLIT_PART(s.name, ' ', array_length(regexp_split_to_array(s.name, ' '), 1)), 1) ASC
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(lesson), 0) FROM score where class_id = #{class_id}
SELECT count(*) FROM score where class_id = #{class_id} and lesson = #{lesson}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM score WHERE lesson = #{lesson} and class_id = #{class_id};
